Title: Hello, World.
SubTitle: The purpose of this project is to put into practice all the knowledge I have acquired over the years. Below, I provide a list of some technical details.

List.0: Frontend developed in JavaScript using the React framework. Hosting provided via Vercel.
List.1: Backend developed in Python using the (framework here) framework. Hosting provided via Render.
List.2: Communication conducted through a RESTful API.
